docs.snippet: Argentina this afternoon sighed the eighth Pan-American Conference's Declaration of Lima on the solidarity of the Americas. Only the signature of Brazil was lacking at a late hour to make the consent unanimous.
docs.lead_paragraph: Argentina this afternoon sighed the eighth Pan-American Conference's Declaration of Lima on the solidarity of the Americas. Only the signature of Brazil was lacking at a late hour to make the consent unanimous.
docs.abstract: all nations except Brazil sign solidarity pact drafted by Cantilo along Hull lines

docs.snippet: The season's outstanding Christmas gift, in so far as the travel field is concerned, was purchased by Mrs. Harry Milne McIntosh of 1,130 Sheridan Road, Lake Forest, Ill., who sailed Friday night on the Grace liner Santa Elena for a sixteen-day cruise...
docs.lead_paragraph: The season's outstanding Christmas gift, in so far as the travel field is concerned, was purchased by Mrs. Harry Milne McIntosh of 1,130 Sheridan Road, Lake Forest, Ill., who sailed Friday night on the Grace liner Santa Elena for a sixteen-day cruise of West Indies ports.

docs.snippet: A long black limousine drove away from the Christmas-decorated White House last Wednesday evening and headed north into the Winter-brown countryside of Maryland. President Roosevelt was dining out, a rare event for him. His host was Secretary of the...
docs.lead_paragraph: A long black limousine drove away from the Christmas-decorated White House last Wednesday evening and headed north into the Winter-brown countryside of Maryland. President Roosevelt was dining out, a rare event for him. His host was Secretary of the Interior Harold L. Ickes. They dined on eggs laid by hens on the Secretary's farm.

docs.snippet: The Eighth Pan-American Conference crowned its labors today with the unanimous announcement that the republics of the Western Hemisphere intend to make common cause in the face of a threat to the peace, security or territorial integrity of any one of...
docs.lead_paragraph: The Eighth Pan-American Conference crowned its labors today with the unanimous announcement that the republics of the Western Hemisphere intend to make common cause in the face of a threat to the peace, security or territorial integrity of any one of them whatever may be the nature of the acts deemed threatening.

headline.main: STRONG STEP TAKEN; Continental Solidarity Is Recorded by Nations of Western Hemisphere HULL HAILS ACHIEVEMENT Secretary of State Receives an Ovation--Landon Also Praises Parley's Work Democratic Spirit Stressed Landon Congratulates Parley 21 REPUBLICS JOIN IN AMERICAN UNITY Other Delegates Join In

docs.snippet: WITZERLAND will issue early in the new year a series of nine stamps, in three sets of three with identifying inscriptions in three languages, as postal propaganda on behalf of the National Exposition of Switzerland at Zurich next May through October.
docs.lead_paragraph: WITZERLAND will issue early in the new year a series of nine stamps, in three sets of three with identifying inscriptions in three languages, as postal propaganda on behalf of the National Exposition of Switzerland at Zurich next May through October.

docs.snippet: WASHINGTON.--The day is coming, and coming fast, when the American traveler will be able to journey to any part of the world in American ships-ships which represent the last word in comfort and in safety, every one American built and operating under...
docs.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON.--The day is coming, and coming fast, when the American traveler will be able to journey to any part of the world in American ships-ships which represent the last word in comfort and in safety, every one American built and operating under the American flag.
